Key Match Events: Son Heung-min scored a penalty in the 11th minute
Son Heung-min scored a header just before half-time
Jung Seung-hyun scored a bullet header assisted by Son Heung-min in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Jurgen Klinsmann's South Korea side maintained their perfect start to 2026 World Cup qualifying
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a sell-out crowd of more than 40,000 in Shenzhen
Others: After thrashing Singapore 5-0 on Thursday, South Korea now top Group C with six points
